Set.Text: Shows [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fish[ENDCOLOR], [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Squid[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pearls[ENDCOLOR] on the map.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Allowes you to construct the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Abu Simple[ENDCOLOR] Wonder, the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Water Mill[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Olive Press[ENDCOLOR] Buildings.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Galleass[ENDCOLOR], the first ranged naval unit. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Harbor[ENDCOLOR], which creates trade routes from cities to the capital over the water, producing [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Additionally, the [ICON_GOLD] Gold yield from Fishing Boats is increased.[NEWLINE]All naval [ICON_SILVER_FIST] units gain one extra [ICON_MOVE] Move.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allowes you to open the [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy Branch [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Exploration[ENDCOLOR] .

llows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Frigate[ENDCOLOR], a powerful Renaissance-era warship, and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Privateer[ENDCOLOR], a unique Naval Unit that can earn [ICON_GOLD] Gold from attacking coastal cities as well as capture enemy ships. Also allows coastal cities to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Seaport[ENDCOLOR], which provides [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from sea resources.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.
Allows you to construct the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Synthetic Petrol Plant[ENDCOLOR] Building.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Triplane[ENDCOLOR], an Air Unit designed to gain control of the skies, and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great War Bomber[ENDCOLOR], which can devastate Land Units and Cities.[NEWLINE]You can now construct the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Prosa Resort[ENDCOLOR] Wonder.[NEWLINE]Provides one additional [ICON_TRADE] Trade Route[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

With Globalization, each Spy you send to another Civilization as a [ICON_DIPLOMAT] Diplomat will increase the number of Delegates you control in the World Congress, bringing you closer to [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]Provides one additional [ICON_TRADE] Trade Route.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Allows you the construction of [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Zeus Statue[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ollantaytambo[ENDCOLOR] wonders and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pit[ENDCOLOR] building.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Reveals [ICON_RES_COAL] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Coal[ENDCOLOR] and allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Factory[ENDCOLOR], a building which greatly improves the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of a city.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Allows Workers to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Railroads[ENDCOLOR] on map tiles. Connecting cities with them will increase [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and units traveling along them will move more quickly.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.
Allows you to construct the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Plastic Factory[ENDCOLOR] Building and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cristo Redento[ENDCOLOR] Wonder.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Row.Text: Allowes the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Artillery Range[ENDCOLOR] Building and you can now train the mighty[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Catapult[ENDCOLOR] Unit.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.
Shows [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tobacco[ENDCOLOR] on the map.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE]Racher[ENDCOLOR] , [COLOR_POSITIVE]Plantation[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE]Herbalist[ENDCOLOR] Buildings.[NEWLINE]Provides one additional [ICON_TRADE] Trade Route.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.
Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE]Orbital Power Transmitter[ENDCOLOR] Building.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Space Elevator[ENDCOLOR] national wonder which greatly increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation, [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture generation in the City of it's origin.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_PLAGUE] Plague by +1.

Set.Text: >Allows your cities to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Aqueducts[ENDCOLOR], increasing the [ICON_FOOD] Food that is carried over as your city grows. Also allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Forts[ENDCOLOR] on map tiles, increasing the defense of units stationed there. Additionally, bridges are automatically added to roads which cross rivers, allowing units to pass over them without slowing down.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

>Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Knight[ENDCOLOR], a fast and powerful mounted unit. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Castle[ENDCOLOR] to improve the [ICON_STRENGTH] Defense of your cities.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.
Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Public School[ENDCOLOR], which increases [ICON_RESEARCH] Science in Cities.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

Allows your Workers to [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chop Jungle[ENDCOLOR], clearing the map tile so other improvements can be constructed. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spearman[ENDCOLOR], a military unit strong against mounted enemies.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +2.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allowes you to open the [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy Branch [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Health[ENDCOLOR]

Reveals [ICON_RES_ALUMINUM] Aluminum, a resource used for many late-game units. Also allows Cities to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Stock Exchange[ENDCOLOR], a building which boosts [ICON_GOLD] Gold. Also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hydro Plant[ENDCOLOR], which increases [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from tiles next to a River, and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Police Station[ENDCOLOR], which hinders a spies' ability to steal your technology.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

Allows the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Supermarket[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cattle Breeder[ENDCOLOR] Buildings.[NEWLINE]Also allows Work Boats to construct an Offshore Platform.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +2.
Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Medical Lab[ENDCOLOR], a building which speeds the [ICON_FOOD] growth of your Cities.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +3.

Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bio Refinery[ENDCOLOR] Building and also allowes the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Three Gorges Dam[ENDCOLOR] Wonder.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]SS Cockpit[ENDCOLOR] , one of the Spaceship parts necessary to win a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Science Victory[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

An important technology for the Space Race, Robotics allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Spaceship Factory[ENDCOLOR], a building which speeds the construction of Spaceship parts.[NEWLINE]It also allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Industrial Robotics[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Skylift[ENDCOLOR] Building.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

Allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Farms[ENDCOLOR], vital for increasing the [ICON_FOOD] [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Food[ENDCOLOR] output of map tiles.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]University[ENDCOLOR], which boosts [ICON_RESEARCH] Science. Also provides new [ICON_RESEARCH] Science-related abilities, like the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Research Agreement[ENDCOLOR], which is a special deal that may be made with other players in the game.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

Allows you to build the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[ENDCOLOR], one of the Spaceship parts necessary to win a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Science Victory[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.

Row.Text: Shows [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Deer[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bisons[ENDCOLOR] on the map.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.
Allowes the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Pont du Gard[ENDCOLOR] wonder and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Aqueduct[ENDCOLOR] building.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.
Allowes the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Armour Workshop[ENDCOLOR] building.[NEWLINE]Military [ICON_SILVER_FIST] Units heal now faster.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +2.

Allowes the construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Waste Plant[ENDCOLOR] Building.[NEWLINE]Provides the ability to create the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Forest Preserve[ENDCOLOR] Improvement.[NEWLINE]Increase [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.
Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Smallpox Eradication[ENDCOLOR] national wonder which increases the happiness of every City.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +3.

Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Human Genome[ENDCOLOR] Wonder which causes each [ICON_CITIZEN] Specialist in your empire to produce an extra [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +1.
Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Robotic Operating Room[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] and [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation. +2 [ICON_HEALTH] Health +1 [ICON_HEALTH] Health

Allows construction of the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Implant Station[ENDCOLOR] which increases [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold generation.[NEWLINE]Increase global [ICON_HEALTH] Health by +2.
